Posts.Content: hummingbyrd It is really a shame hummingbyrd, that this board stymies some people with a no nonsense, sometimes harsh and honest writing style. I believe in "measured" moral support and consider it important. But overkill with sugar is useless and sometimes dangerous. To force down posts that have usefulness and value is undesirable. It is very unfortunate to see useful, time-consuming and dedicated research unappreciated in favor of pabulum that seldom adds a day to a cancer patient's life.
Posts.Title: Need to know something...
